messages.DATABASE_EXECUTION: Failed to execute {action} to the {database} database
messages.DATABASE_VALIDATION: Failed to validate datas ({path}) on the {database} database on executing {action}
messages.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many requests. Try again later
messages.BAD_REQUEST: Bad request. Check the parameters of request
messages.AWS_SES_SEND_FAIL: Email send failed. Try again. If it occurs repeatedly, please contact to admin.
